Introduction

Shuai is a smart fast-learner who has more than three years experience in full-stack web development with various frameworks like Django and Rails. He is responsible for designing and maintaining reliable and efficient web backend services. Currently as a Master student at UC, Santa Cruz, now Shuai is actively seeking for Software Development Engineer 2018 summer internship.
Connect Shuai on LinkedIN

Brief Biography

Shuai Palm Zhou is a Master student who majors in Computer Science in Jack Baskin School at University of California, Santa Cruz. In 2016, Shuai obtained the Bachelor of Science degree in Software Technology and Application and graduated with first class honors from Faculty of Information Technology at Macau University of Science and Technology. From Feb. 2016 to May 2017, Under the supervision of Dr.Jun Wan, Shuai worked as a research intern in National Laboratory of Pattern Recognition at Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Science.

What's new?

  • Sept. 2017. Shuai Came to UC, Santa Cruz pursuing Master degree in Computer Science.
  • Mar. 2017. Jianzhu Guo and Shuai proposed multi-modality method with Visual and Geometrical information, and their approach resulted in first place on Joint Challenge on Dominant and Complementary Emotion Recognition, FG 2017
  • June. 2016. Shuai received his bachelor degree and graduated from Macau University of Science and Technology with first class honors.
